entries.description: Airris is one of the new cast members on season 16 of "Married at First Sight" but, in this clip exclusive to Newsweek, his family is not happy.

entries.title: Huge Majority of Brits to Snub Prince Harry's Memoir: Poll
entries.description: New polling from YouGov in the U.K. suggests that Harry's bombshell literary project has failed to generate interest among his fellow countrymen.

entries.title: Owner's Unusual Signal to Dog for Walkies Delights Internet
entries.description: An owner has revealed her unusual sign to her dog that it's time to go out.

entries.title: What Happens if There's No House Speaker?
entries.description: Kevin McCarthy failed to secure the required majority after three ballots and the House agreed to adjourn.

entries.title: Labrador's Reaction to Bath Time Has Internet in Stitches: 'Don't Touch'
entries.description: One TikToker wrote of the clip with 3.7 million views, "bro went from wholesome to demon in half a second," as another put, "he said 'don't touch don't touch'."

entries.title: 'Varsity Blues' Mastermind Could Face Six Years in Prison for College Scam
entries.description: Prosecutors are asking the courts to make Rick Singer pay $19.3 million to the IRS as well as the six-year prison sentence.

entries.title: Amber McLaughlin's Final Words Before Missouri Execution
entries.description: McLaughlin, 49, was put to death for stalking and killing a former girlfriend.

entries.title: Republicans Savaged as 'Clowns' After McCarthy's Failed Speaker Bid
entries.description: McCarthy critics from both ends of the political spectrum said that the GOP was becoming a "clown show" after the failed speaker of the House vote.

entries.title: Chrysler Shows off Future Technology Powered by a Brain
entries.description: At CES 2023, Chrysler showcased a new vision for the cockpit of Stellantis vehicles.

entries.title: Matt Gaetz Questions McCarthy's Status as a 'Squatter' in Speaker's Office
entries.description: Former House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy reportedly moved his staff into the speaker's office prior to the chamber's vote on Tuesday.

entries.title: Which 'Will Trent' Book Is ABC Show Based on? Karin Slaughter on Adaptation
entries.description: Bestselling crime author Karin Slaughter spoke to Newsweek about having her "Will Trent" books adapted by ABC and the "very collaborative" process.

entries.title: Jeremy Renner's Photo From Hospital Bed Prompts Love From Marvel Co-Stars
entries.description: Renner thanked fans for their "kind words" while sharing a photo of himself recovering in a hospital bed on Tuesday.

entries.title: Trump Clams Up on McCarthy Endorsement, Says 'Everybody' Wants His Support
entries.description: The former president has previously backed McCarthy's bid for House speaker. McCarthy failed to win the position after three separate votes Tuesday.

entries.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Rips GOP's 'Russian Roulette' Over McCarthy
entries.description: McCarthy failed to secure a majority of votes over the course of three ballots, with 20 Republicans ultimately breaking rank to oppose him.

entries.title: Everything We Know About AOC's Talks With Gosar and Gaetz
entries.description: Ocasio-Cortez sparked speculation on Tuesday after being spotted speaking with her ideological opposites on the House floor.

entries.title: Body Cam Footage Shows Bryan Kohberger Traffic Stop on Drive Home
entries.description: Kohberger—the prime suspect in the Idaho murder investigation—was traveling with his father cross-country to go home for the holidays.
